qualitygateCommandDescription: waits for SonarQube quality gate to complete and returns result
serverFlagDescription: SonarQube server. Defaults to CodeScan Cloud (https://app.codescan.io)
organizationFlagDescription: CodeScan Organization Id. Only required when connecting to CodeScan Cloud
projectKeyFlagDescription: sonar.projectKey - the project key to create
errorDuplicateValues: The following flags are duplicated. Please check your settings: %s
noqualitygateFlagDescription: Don't wait until the SonarQube background task is finished and return the build Quality Gate
qgtimeoutFlagDescription: Timeout in seconds to wait for Quality Gate to complete (default 300)
errorTokenAndUserPass: Only one of token or user+pass should be specified
errorOnlyUserOrPass: Username and password must be specified
